data.text: @the_dos really enjoying The Flash, Arrow had a good start, then dipped a bit,but think it picked up in Season 2 and I really like Season 3
@The_LukeBarnes Agreed. I think The Flash has been great. Hopefully it'll change their mind. Arrow has been hit and miss though.
@The_LukeBarnes Well we didn't see his face the last time around, and the voice will be totally different. So not even Chris Evans weird.
